nodes.text: Sense Force Potential was a Force power in the Sense family of abilities. Jedi could use the Force to probe the mind of another to determine whether or not that individual had the potential to use the Force. The subconscious of a Force-sensitive was protected by a barrier that prevented another Force user from invading their mind. The barrier violently rejected the probe as an involuntarily defense mechanism. Jedi seeking to see if an individual was Force-sensitive could deliberately stimulate the area in order to trigger a reaction.
